title: Player Registration Successful Completion
description: Verify that a user can successfully complete the two-step player registration flow, generating a unique reference number and storing data accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to player registration step 1 page
Enter valid player details and submit
Verify data is accepted, no validation errors displayed
Proceed to player registration step 2 page
Enter required step 2 information and submit
Verify submission is successful and a unique reference number is generated
Verify registration data is persisted correctly in the backend

title: Player Registration Validation Errors
description: Check that invalid or missing inputs during player registration trigger proper validation errors on both steps.

steps.description: Navigate to player registration step 1 page
Submit the form with empty or malformed fields
Verify appropriate validation error messages are displayed
Enter some valid data, proceed to step 2
Submit step 2 form with invalid data
Verify validation errors appear on step 2

title: Admin Login and Authentication
description: Verify that admins can log in via the admin login page with correct credentials, and that access to admin routes is restricted based on authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page
Input valid admin username and password
Submit login form
Verify login is successful and admin dashboard is displayed
Attempt to access admin pages while logged out
Verify access is denied and redirected to login page

title: Admin Dashboard CRUD Operations on News
description: Confirm that admin users can create, read, update and delete news items via the admin dashboard and API, and changes reflect on the public news pages.

steps.description: Log in as admin and go to news management page
Create a new news item with title, content, and image
Verify the news item is saved successfully and visible in the admin list
Edit the created news item changing content
Verify updated content is saved and displayed correctly
Delete the news item
Verify the news item is removed from admin and public pages

title: Events Public Listing and Registration
description: Validate that events are listed properly on public pages, event details show correctly, and users can register for an event via the event registration form.

steps.description: Navigate to the public events listing page
Confirm all upcoming events are displayed with correct info
Click an event to view its detail page
Verify event details including date, location, description, and media are correct
Use the event registration form to register with valid data
Confirm registration submission is successful and confirmation is shown
Submit event registration with invalid/missing required fields
Verify validation error messages are displayed appropriately

title: Admin Event CRUD with Media Upload
description: Ensure admins can create, read, update, and delete events including uploading media files such as images, and changes are reflected publicly.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to event management page
Create a new event with all details and upload hero images
Verify the event and media uploads are successful
Edit the event's details and update the uploaded images
Confirm updates are saved and images replaced correctly
Delete the event
Verify the event is removed from both admin and public listings

title: Elections Management CRUD by Admin
description: Verify that election cycles and candidate info can be created, edited, viewed, and deleted by admins via the dashboard and APIs.

steps.description: Login as admin and go to elections management page
Create a new election with relevant data
Check that election is listed correctly in admin
Edit the election details
Verify updates are saved correctly
Delete the election
Confirm election is removed from admin and public views

title: Anti-Doping Guidelines Public View and Admin Management
description: Confirm that anti-doping guidelines documents and content are viewable on public pages and editable by admins through CRUD operations.

steps.description: Visit the anti-doping guidelines public page
Verify content and document viewer loads and displays PDFs or documents properly
Log in as admin and navigate to anti-doping guidelines management
Create a new guideline document entry
Confirm the new document is saved and appears in admin list
Edit an existing guideline
Verify the updates are saved and visible publicly
Delete a guideline
Confirm removal from admin and public views

title: History and General Body Content Management
description: Validate that static content sections for history and general body are editable by admins, served via API, and render correctly on public pages.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to history content management
Create or edit history content and save changes
Check that updated content is persisted and appears on public history page
Repeat above for general body content section
Verify updates appear correctly on the public general body page

title: Hero Images and File Manager Upload and Display
description: Ensure admins can upload, browse and manage hero images and files via the file manager, and these media files are served correctly on public pages.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open hero images management
Upload valid image files and save
Verify files upload successfully and are listed in file manager
Navigate to a public page that uses hero images
Confirm uploaded hero images are displayed correctly
Attempt to upload unsupported or too large files
Check proper error messages are shown and upload is blocked

title: Results and Statistics Display and Admin Input
description: Check that results and stats are presented correctly to public users and that admins can input or update this data effectively.

steps.description: Visit the results and statistics public page
Verify results and statistics data are rendered with correct formatting
Log in as admin and navigate to results management
Create or update results and stats information
Confirm admin updates are saved and reflected on the public results page

title: Site-wide Search and Quick Links Functionality
description: Verify that site-wide search returns relevant results from news, events, documents, and quick links provide curated navigation shortcuts.

steps.description: Enter various search queries in the search box
Verify relevant results from news, events, and guidelines appear
Use quick links from the homepage or footer to navigate
Confirm quick links direct to the correct pages and content

title: Responsive Design Across Devices
description: Ensure the website layout, components, and navigation adapt correctly and remain usable on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the homepage on desktop screen
Verify layout is complete with no broken UI elements
Resize window to tablet size and reload
Confirm UI components adapt and navigation remains accessible
Open the site on a mobile device or emulator
Ensure responsive menu, readable text, and properly scaled images

title: Navigation Links and URL Verification
description: Validate that all navigation links in the navbar, footer, and quick links function correctly and lead to the proper pages with correct URLs and active highlights.

steps.description: Click each navigation bar link
Verify the URL updates correctly and the destination page loads
Check the active navigation item is highlighted
Click footer and quick links
Confirm links lead to correct pages without errors

title: Form Input Validation Across Site
description: Check that all forms on the site including registration, event registration, admin forms validate inputs correctly with appropriate error messages and success confirmations.

steps.description: Submit empty or invalid inputs on player registration, event registration, and admin edit forms
Verify all relevant validation errors are displayed and form submission is blocked
Submit valid inputs
Confirm forms submit successfully and show confirmations

title: No Broken Links, Images or JS Console Errors
description: Navigate through the entire public site and admin pages verifying no broken links, missing images, or JavaScript console errors appear.

steps.description: Browse all accessible pages on desktop and mobile emulation
Check for 404 errors or broken links on images and anchors
Open browser console and ensure no JavaScript errors are logged
